name: SQmedia
tagline: Dallas Digital Marketing and Innovation Agency
description: SQmedia is an inbound digital marketing and innovation agency for B2B technology companies. SQmedia practices a data-driven approach including predictive marketing, demand generation, inbound marketing (Hubspot Certified Agency), digital marketing, growth-driven (dynamic) web development, advanced search strategies, technical content creation, social media exploitation, digital PR and corporate video production.
